meanings.definition: Of or relating to a yellow or yellowish color.
meanings.sent1: The xanthic flowers brightened up the garden.
meanings.sent2: Her xanthic dress matched the sunny day perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The xanthic paint spilled, creating a yellow trail on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The xanthic glow of the sunset painted the sky in golden hues.
meanings.sent5: The xanthic hues of the sunrise filled the horizon with warmth.

meanings.sent1: The ripe bananas were xanthic and ready to eat.
meanings.sent2: The xanthic leaves of autumn covered the ground in a golden blanket.
meanings.sent3: His xanthic shoes stood out among the crowd of dark colors.
meanings.sent4: The xanthic glow of the streetlights illuminated the foggy night.
meanings.sent5: The xanthic glow of the fireflies lit up the summer evening.

meanings.sent1: The artist mixed the xanthic with other colors to create a vibrant painting.
meanings.sent2: The xanthic on the palette added a pop of color to the artwork.
meanings.sent3: The xanthic in the paint tube spilled, leaving a yellow stain on the table.
meanings.sent4: The xanthic of the sunset reflected on the calm lake.
meanings.sent5: The xanthic of the flower petals attracted bees in the garden.
